item.title: Trump administration offering buyouts to nearly all federal workers
item.description: The Trump administration is offering millions of federal workers the option to accept buyouts through a government-wide "deferred resignation" program...

item.title: Judge pauses Trump funding freeze order until Feb. 3
item.description: The Trump administration order would have frozen the issuance of existing federal grants and loans until agencies vetted them.

item.title: White House says Medicaid portal 'will be back online shortly' after Trump funding freeze blamed
item.description: A funding freeze ordered by the Trump administration has sparked widespread confusion about its effects on government programs such as Medicaid.

item.title: Man arrested with Molotov cocktails aimed to kill Treasury secretary at Capitol, police say
item.description: The nomination of Scott Bessent as Treasury secretary by President Donald Trump was confirmed Monday by the Senate.

item.title: Trump funding freeze challenged in lawsuit by nonprofits, small business group
item.description: The suit seeks a temporary pause on the Office of Management and Budget's edict to align spending to be consistent with President Donald Trump's polic...
